about_the_game:
As summer starts winding down, how about a nice trip to the Pleasure Villa? Our sexy vixen will take care of all your needs from the comfort of your own home in splending VR!

What’s your favorite? Handjob, titjob, pussy fucking or pegging?

The great news is, with our latest mini-game release, you don’t even have to chose between either of those, since you get all of them!

While there's not much the mistress will allow you to do, here's how to get *some* control in the scene :)

*********************************************************************************************************************
Hit Spacebar to exit the forced mode; this way you can move around. Hit second time and you are locked again. Esc exits the scene.

Device specific:

Vive: If you want to move, after the spacebar use controller, aim where you want to go and press trigger. When you are asked to please her, attach one controller to your belt and thrust with your pelvis.

Oculus Rift: Nod your head slightly up and down when asked to fuck her

2D: When you are asked to please her, press mouse button. Move: mouse & WASD

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes depictions of uncensored sexual acts performed in a BDSM/Bondage setting featuring a voiced female dominatrix.
